title: FedEx Cup 2014: Go-to clubs for the top 5 ranked players
headline: Go-To Clubs For the Top 5 in the FedEx Cup
description: Chris Kirk, Billy Horschel, Bubba Watson, Rory McIlroy and Hunter Mahan have the inside track to take home the FedEx Cup and its $10 million bonus. Here’s a quick look at each guy’s go-to club(s), based on statistical rankings throughout the 2013-2014 campaign.
short_headline: Go-To Clubs For the Top 5 in the FedEx Cup
page_title: FedEx Cup 2014: Go-to clubs for the top 5 ranked players
slug: Go-To Clubs For the Top 5 in the FedEx Cup
body: Chris Kirk, Billy Horschel, Bubba Watson, Rory McIlroy and Hunter Mahan have the inside track to take home the FedEx Cup and its $10 million bonus. Here’s a quick look at each guy’s go-to club(s), based on statistical rankings throughout the 2013-2014 campaign.
